content: This is what I’ve been focusing on more and more. Out of my last two Ebooks, my audience has both helped me pick the title, the cover, and give me a bunch of suggestions on what they need covered so I’m sure to include that in the books. I wrote a detailed Medium post about my weird feelings about my latest #1 Amazon success here: https://medium.com/@bbenediktsson/10-things-i-learned-from-launching-an-amazon-best-seller-9e4cc8afb318 if you’d like to take a look. Always a pleasure to read your writing. I read your 80/20 article this morning as well, which reinforced a lot of my feelings about what’s been working for me. Cheers, Björgvin
